page.title: 20TRANSPORT.HOLT.WORCS.
page.content: Two main roads 1{A4133}west to Wales and east to M.5 motorway.Bridges Severn at only place between Worcester and Stourport. Road very busy,carrying much commercial,commuter and holiday traffic. Bridge at Holt Fleet narrow and inadequate. Joins2 {A443 }and{ {B4196 }Worcester to Stourport at Holt Heath. Well-surfaced lanes very narrow.{Public transport:}Midland Red between Worcester and Birmingham via Stourport several times a day.Twice weekly private bus between Holt and Droitwich. School buses taking children to schools in Ombersley, Droitwich,Hallow and Martley. A car is almost a necessity. Compiled by: {OMBERSLEY AND DOVERDALE WOMEN'S {INSTITUTE.}
